title: English Countryside Manor Elegance with Award-Winning Restaurant
description: Be captivated by the quaint historic villages and rural charm of Warminster when you stay at Bishopstrow Hotel & Spa, a 17th-century Georgian mansion enveloped by 30 acres of private garden. While you're here, dine at the award-winning The Restaurant for an exquisite meal while sipping on exceptional wine handpicked by a sommelier. For a splash of indulgence, opt for pampering at the spa with an infrared sauna, spa treatments, a swimming pool and mud therapy.
offer_address: Boreham Road, Warminster BA12 9HH, United Kingdom
